verses.text: He arose from there and came into the borders of Judea and beyond the Jordan. Multitudes came together to him again. As he usually did, he was again teaching them.
Pharisees came to him testing him, and asked him, “Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife?”
He answered, “\+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w did|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w command|strong="G1781"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*?”
